trans-unit.source: Represents an integer value that is either 1 or 0 to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
trans-unit.target: 데이터베이스에서 저장하거나 검색할 정수 값(0 또는 1)을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Any non-zero value is interpreted as 1.

The key difference between a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> structure and a standard Boolean value is that, where a standard Boolean has two possible values, `true` and `false`, a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> structure has three possible values, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False>, or <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null>.
trans-unit.target: 주요 차이점은 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> 구조와 표준 부울 값은 표준 부울에 두 개의 가능한 값이 여기서 `true` 및 `false`, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean> 구조에 세 가지 값 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False>, 또는 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> structure.
The value for the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> structure; either <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 새 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> 구조체의 값(<see langword="true" /> 또는 <see langword="false" />)입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> structure using the supplied Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 부울 값을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> 구조체의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The integer whose value is to be used for the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 새 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> 구조체에 사용할 값이 있는 정수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> structure using the specified integer value.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 정수 값을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> 구조체의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> structure.
Computes the bitwise AND operation of two specified <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> structures.

trans-unit.source: The result of the logical AND operation.
Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> structure as a byte.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> 구조체의 값을 바이트 형식으로 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A byte representing the value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> structure.
The byte value will be either 0 or 1.
Compares this instance to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스를 지정된 개체와 비교하여 상대 값의 표시를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented to support the <xref:System.IComparable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 지원 하도록 구현 된 <xref:System.IComparable> 인터페이스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> object to the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> object and returns an indication of their relative values.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if object is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> and the two are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> structure.

Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> structures to determine whether they are equal.

A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 인스턴스가 같으면 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" />인 <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" />의 인스턴스 중 하나가 null인 경우, <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" />의 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" />는 <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />이 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.
